label: 忠義様、忠豊様、豊昌様御在江戸御入目増減引比覚
ローマ字1: Tadayoshi-sama, Tadatoyo-sama, Toyomasa-sama gozai Edo oirime zōgen hikikurabe oboe
ローマ字1_mod: Tadayoshi sama, Tadatoyo sama, Toyomasa sama gozai Edo oirime zōgen hikikurabe oboe
ローマ字2: Tadayoshi-sama, Tadatoyo-sama, Toyomasa-sama gozai Edo oirime zogen hikikurabe oboe
対訳語: document; a comparison of the Edo expenses of the second, third, and fourth daimyo of Tosa compiled by domain finance officials at the end of the seventeenth century
本: Mercantilism in a Japanese Domain:  the Merchant Origins of Economic Nationalism in 18th-Century Tosa . Cambridge University Press . 1998
見出し読み: ただよしさま、ただとよさま、とよまささまございえどおいりめぞうげんひきくらべおぼえ
